title: DuskBlade of Draktharr good for Kindred?
body:
I need a good build for Kindred for Top lane/Mid/Bot lane. Wondering if Duskblade can be good for them or what's the benefits for Duskblade; what makes it unique?

Not many build guides for Kindred, other than JG.

replies.body:
Kindred cant really play anything except jungle, which would be why there are no guides.

High mana costs, low range, no sustain, passive is useless in a lane, basically just a way worse version of top vayne.

You can make ADC work. But I would stick to normal adc items.  Try building her like vayne, jinx or lucian.  Her early game is weak and it's ideal to roam which means you need a jg to help you a bit.  It's really disruptive if played well though.
